text: Kandi nimuramuka mutinye amakimbirane aganisha ku butane hagati yabo bombi, muzaboherereze abunzi (babiri), umwe uturutse mu muryango w’umugabo n’undi uturutse mu muryango w’umugore; niba bombi bashaka ubwiyunge, Allah azabibashoboza. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje, Uzi neza ibyo mukora
